model.body:
Like what you see? Want to know where to get it? Use our list to find the store nearest you stocking all the items you’ll find in the fashion pages. If it’s not here, scroll down and check out our Directory below—a solid reference to have on hand. Prices quoted are approximate and subject to change.

Cover. ON MICHAEL B. JORDAN, SUIT JACKET, $3,620, and PANTS, $1,390: Tom Ford, at Tom Ford, Beverly Hills, Las Vegas, Miami, and N.Y.C.; see the Directory below. HENLEY: Tom Ford, at Tom Ford, Beverly Hills, Dallas, Las Vegas, Miami, and N.Y.C.; see the Directory below. BRACELET: Cartier, at Cartier, nationwide; [cartier.us](http://cartier.us/). WATCH: Frédérique Constant, at [frederique-constant.com](http://frederique-constant.com/). NECKLACE (Franco chain): his own.

Cover. ON ROB LOWE, SUIT JACKET, $375, and PANTS, $160: Tallia Orange, at Lord & Taylor, nationwide. SHIRT and TIE: Burberry London, at [us.burberry.com](http://us.burberry.com/). POCKET SQUARE: Ferrell Reed, at Norton Ditto, Houston; Jeff’s Haberdashery, New Orleans; Kinkade’s Fine Clothing, Ridgeland, Miss.; Greenhaw’s Men’s Wear, Little Rock, Ark. RINGS: his own.

Cover. ON RYAN REYNOLDS, SUIT JACKET, $1,595, and PANTS, $795: Burberry Prorsum, at [us.burberry.com](http://us.burberry.com/). T-SHIRT: Todd Snyder + Champion, at [toddsnyder.com](http://toddsnyder.com/). WATCH: Patek Philippe, at Patek Philippe at Gearys, Beverly Hills; see the Directory below (Patek Philippe). BRACELET: A.P.C., at A.P.C., Bond St., N.Y.C.; [apc.fr](http://apc.fr/).

 Page 48. ON RYAN REYNOLDS, JACKET: Emporio Armani, at Emporio Armani, nationwide; see the Directory below. CARGO PANTS: Armani Exchange, at [armaniexchange.com](http://armaniexchange.com/). Page 71. BOOTS: John Varvatos, at [johnvarvatos.com](http://johnvarvatos.com/). JEANS, $1,625: Balmain, at [balmain.com](http://balmain.com/); Barneys New York, select stores; Bergdorf Goodman Men’s, N.Y.C.; Maxfield, Los Angeles; The Webster, Miami.
